channel.title: Basketball analytics on Mínimos Cuadrados
channel.description: Recent content in Basketball analytics on Mínimos Cuadrados

item.title: Analyzing FC Barcelona's assists pattern
item.description: Introduction eurolig is an R package that I just created for obtaining and analyzing basketball data games from the Euroleague. In this post I show how to use the package to analyze different aspects of the way FC Barcelona passes the ball in this Euroleague 2018-2019. More specifically, we are interested in finding out: What type of shot each assist generates How many points are being generated by each assist
